at.pwd.boardgame.game.agent

Interface Agent<GameType extends Game,ActionType extends AgentAction>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    HumanAgent<GameType,ActionType>, MancalaAgent
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MancalaHumanAgent

    public interface Agent<GameType extends Game,ActionType extends AgentAction>
    The interface describing an Agent. An agent is able to "do a turn" so it should return (given a certain computation time and a Game) an action.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ActionType doTurn(int computationTime, GameType game)
      Should calculate the turn.

    • Method Detail

      • doTurn

        ActionType doTurn(int computationTime,
                  GameType game)
        Should calculate the turn. It may take computationTime many seconds and has a Game as its input. Calculation is not done on the main ui thread, instead on a background thread. You are allowed to alter the Game objects state.
        Parameters:
        computationTime - given calculation time in seconds
        game - given game (with mutable state)
        Returns:
        action that should be done for the current turn.
